sentences.sContent: It may well be the case that the people raising the concerns have a personal or motivational problem with the improvement but don't feel comfortable voicing it.
sentences.sContent_eng: It may well be the case that the people raising the concerns have a personal or motivational problem with the improvement but don't feel comfortable voicing it.
sentences.sCn: 很可能那些提出个人担忧的人就有某种个人或动机问题需要改进，这是好事，但说出来以后并不一定会感到舒服一些。

sentences.sContent: My motivational system ensures that when I imagine the objectively better future it looks really great, far better than all the other options -- I'll be so happy!
sentences.sContent_eng: My motivational system ensures that when I imagine the objectively better future it looks really great, far better than all the other options -- I'll be so happy!
sentences.sCn: 我的动机系统确保当我想象客观上更好的未来时，会感觉这种选择很棒，比其他所有选择都要棒得多──我会非常快乐！

phrases.pCn: 激励技能；激励方法（motivational technique的复数）

words.tran: 动作；移动；手势；请求；意向
主题；动机；主旨；图形；意念
使产生动机；激发…的积极性（motivate的过去式和过去分词）
刺激；使有动机；激发…的积极性

trans.tranCn: 动机的， 有关动机的
